headline: Is It Too Late to Consider Arista After 5.9% Weekly Surge?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Arista Networks stock? You’re definitely not alone. With growth like this, most investors are at least a little curious. In just the past week, shares climbed 5.9%. Zooming out, Arista is up a jaw-dropping 993.6% over five years, with strong gains of 47.8% in the past year and nearly 38% year-to-date. These numbers hint at a company that’s found serious momentum, but they also have plenty of people questioning whether the stock can keep up its pace, or if things...
